column3:
Here's documentation for the 4 new options being added, taken from the [freedesktop.org docs](https://www.freedesktop.org/software/systemd/man/systemd.exec.html).

#### ProtectSystem
Takes a boolean argument or the special values "full" or "strict". If true, mounts the /usr and /boot directories read-only for processes invoked by this unit. If set to "full", the /etc directory is mounted rea

Hi all, I'm working on #12255 which also changes the systemd service file and sets up the pidfile, datadir, and conffile with the right permissions and at the right places. @laanwj told me to coordinate my changes with people here. From what I see things should be compatible except I make the assumption that the service is running as `bitcoin:bitcoin`, which I think we should be according to init.
utACK modulo fixed review feedback above

Nit: Remove trailing "." to get consistency with the remaining comments.
